title: Construction Marketing
description: Methods of construction marketing and business development. Innovative computer applications, verbal skills development, professional strategies, market segmentation, and buyer behavior.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BC 2630 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BC 3600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BC 3610 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BC 3620 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
